movies.title: Avatar
movies.synopsis: Avatar akan kembali ke layar lebar.Seorang Marinir lumpuh dikirim ke bulan Pandora untuk menjalani misi khusus namun, ia justru dilema antara mengikuti perintah atau melindungi dunia baru yang pelan-pelan ia panggil rumah

currentWatch.title: One Piece Film: Red
currentWatch.synopsis: Untuk pertama kalinya, Uta - penyanyi paling dicintai akan mengungkapkan dirinya kepada dunia di konser langsungnya. Suara yang ditunggu-tunggu oleh seluruh dunia akan segera bergema.

isPrevious.title: The Dark Knight
isPrevious.synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

isPrevious.title: The Dark Knight Rises
isPrevious.synopsis: Bane, an imposing terrorist, attacks Gotham City and disrupts its eight-year-long period of peace. This forces Bruce Wayne to come out of hiding and don the cape and cowl of Batman again.
